# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belts at positions (x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position (x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when burner entities run out of fuel
- Ensure that fuel is provided to burner entities before they run out.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that source items are provided to entities that are waiting for them.

### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that entities that require electricity are connected to the electric network.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups are filled with the required fluid.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that entities that require electricity are plugged into the electric network.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned include:
* Entity positions (e.g. x=41.0, y=-82.0)
* Entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
* Entity types (e.g. burner-mining-drill, stone-furnace, offshore-pump)
